sentence: They had shipped star running back Herschel Walker to Minnesota for a massive haul, including eight picks, and quarterback Steve Walsh to New Orleans for three more.
author: Sam Fortier
title: The enduring value of the NFL drafts most famous and misunderstood chart

sentence: March 2002 This is the most excited I have been since then, Jerry said referring to the teams trade of Herschel Walker, in 1989.
title: When it comes to offseason promises, Dallas Cowboys owner Jerry Jones is the GOAT
